sentence.Network_en: He wore a belted raincoat that accentuated his portly middle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿着一件系腰带的雨衣，使他发福的腰身更加显眼。

sentence.Network_en: My face and raincoat were soaking wet.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的脸上、雨衣上处处湿淋淋的。

sentence.Network_en: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把罂粟花别在了他的雨衣上。

sentences.en: He took his neighbour's raincoats by mistake, so he hung them back outside.
sentences.cn: 他错收了邻居家的雨衣, 于是又把它们挂回原处。

jushi.english: You can hang up your raincoat there.
jushi.chinese: 你可以把雨衣挂在那儿。

jushi.english: She hung out the wet raincoat on the line to dry.
jushi.chinese: 她把湿雨衣晾在外面的绳子上。

jushi.english: I hesitate to spend so much money on such a raincoat.
jushi.chinese: 我不太愿意花这么多钱买这样一件雨衣。
